meanings.definition: To clean or tidy a house or room.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy charing my room every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent2: She is charing the living room before the guests arrive.
meanings.sent3: After charing the house, she found her missing earring under the sofa.
meanings.sent4: The sun charing the windows made the room feel warm and cozy.
meanings.sent5: Charing the kitchen made it sparkle like a diamond.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning or tidying a house or room.
meanings.sent1: Her charing of the house was thorough and efficient.
meanings.sent2: We could see the results of her charing in every corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful charing of the yarn made a mess in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The charing of the garden after winter felt like a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: The charing of the attic revealed forgotten treasures.
